thread.title: Delaware Bans Child Marriage, Becoming First State to Do So

author: wsjcom
title: Delaware Bans Child Marriage, Becoming First State to Do So
text:
Delaware has become the first state in the nation to completely ban marriage for anyone under 18.
Democratic Gov. John Carney on Wednesday signed into law the measure that makes it illegal for minors to get married, even if their parents approve. Previously, anyone could get married in the state at any age with a judgeâ€™s approval.
Supporters...
